sentences.english: With increasing temperature, the samples undergo a transition from ferrimagnetism to paramagnetism.
sentences.chinese: 随温度升高，样品由亚铁磁性逐渐过渡到顺磁性。

sentences.english: The treatment sequence involved addition of ferrous sulfate for precipitation and subsequence filtration.
sentences.chinese: 处理步骤是先加硫酸亚铁使之沉淀，然后过滤。

sentences.english: Olivine-type LiFePO4 cathode material was successfully synthesized by co-precipitation method.
sentences.chinese: 采用共沉淀法合成了橄榄石型磷酸亚铁锂正极材料。

sentences.english: Add Ferroin indicator and titrate with 0.025 N ferrous ammonium sulphate solution.
sentences.chinese: 加入亚铁菲绕啉离子，用滴定法测量硫酸亚铁铵溶液。

sentences.english: Add Ferroin indicator and titrate with 0.025 N ferrous ammonium sulphate solution.
sentences.chinese: 加入亚铁菲绕啉离子，用滴定法测量硫酸亚铁铵溶液。

sentences.english: Ferrous sulfate and ibuprofen are prescribed for pain.
sentences.chinese: 如果腹痛服用硫酸亚铁和布洛芬。

sentences.english: To aim at its self-ignition accident in overhaul, control countermeasure were brought forwards.
sentences.chinese: 针对检修过程中硫化亚铁自燃事故提出了控制对策。

sentences.english: The non-heme iron has not been linked with cancer.
sentences.chinese: 非亚铁血红素和癌症之间没有联系。

sentences.english: Nodules contain a mixture of ferrous and ferrous-oxy leghemoglobin .
sentences.chinese: 根瘤含有亚铁和亚铁一氧化豆血红蛋白的混合物。

sentences.english: Nodules contain a mixture of ferrous and ferrous-oxy leghemoglobin .
sentences.chinese: 根瘤含有亚铁和亚铁一氧化豆血红蛋白的混合物。

sentences.english: The action mechanism of ferrous ion was studied.
sentences.chinese: 并探讨了亚铁离子的作用机理。

sentences.english: H4Fe(CN)6), a white unstable acid formed from ferrocyanide salts.
sentences.chinese: 一种白色的不稳定酸，由氰亚铁酸盐形成。

sentences.english: The contents of tea polyphenols in tea can be determined with ferrous tartrate colo…
sentences.chinese: 采用酒石酸亚铁比色法测定茶多酚含量。

definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)
